item.title: IIA addresses the challenges of internal auditing in the digital era
item.description:
Singapore’s fifth yearly Public Sector Internal Audit (PSIA) Conference, themed Rising to the Challenges of the Future, centered on economic shifts and transformations. The Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA), organizer of the PSIA, emphasized that organizations face mounting hurdles in our increasingly digital world, including cybercrime and technological disruptions. Consequently, internal audits are even more critical for strong governance in both public and private sectors.
